mapper.select: SELECT NO , TITLE , ENROLL_DATE , HIT FROM NOTICE WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY NO DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) AS LISTCOUNT FROM OVERDUE O JOIN BORROW B ON B.BORROW_NO = O.BORROW_NO JOIN BOOK_STATUS S ON S.STATUS_NO = O.STATUS_NO JOIN BOOK_LIST L ON L.BOOK_NO = B.BOOK_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_NO = O.MEMBER_NO WHERE M.DEL_YN = 'N'
